The amethyst pupil on this medallion glows softly when your thoughts take root in the minds of those around you.

Neck Slot: Uncommon

Enhancement Bonus: Fortitude, Reflex, and Will

Properties:

  • You gain an item bonus to Insight checks equal to the medallion's enhancement bonus.
  • You can communicate telepathically with any creature you can see. Those willing to communicate with you can send thoughts back to you, allowing two-way communication. This telepathic communication fulfills the requirement of a class feature or power that a target be able to hear you.

Power âœ¦ Daily (Free Action)

Trigger: An enemy you grant combat advantage to hits or misses you.

Effect: The triggering enemy grants combat advantage to your allies until the start of your next turn.
